Anupriyam Ranjit

How does React work

01 May 2024

The article provides a succinct introduction to React's function in rendering HTML for web apps. It mentions prominent companies that use React and simplifies the process of web content delivery. The main focus is on explaining how React renders HTML, showcasing the conversion of HTML into a tree structure of nodes using an example snippet and an accompanying image. Overall, it aims to give readers a basic grasp of React's role in rendering web content.

SWE, Frontend
